Text.val: 08.07.2014 SH SCR19099 Added handling for stock files (set PO.RUNTYPE = 'S' if PI.ACTIONTYPE = 'S')
20.01.2010 SH SCR15255 Extended PO.RUNTYPE updates for old record formats
21.05.2008 SH SCR13637 Added old debtor file handling (PI.ACTIONTYPE = 'D')
08.01.2008 SH SCR13260 Added new debtor file handling (PI.RECORDFLAG = 90)
.. In case of PI.ACTIONTYPE = V no run type is necessary, because
the invoice file has to be tested only
... if BSP201-20 (new record layount) was performed, then
... if BSP201-30 / 40 (old record layounts) were performed
